title: Kuo: Apple Watch Series 8 could feature body temperature measurement, depends on algorithm quality
content:
Apple Watch Series 7 was first rumored to get the new body temperature sensor last year, but as we all know, this feature didn’t make the cut – as well as a complete redesign of the Watch.

Now, for the Apple Watch Series 8, it seems the wearable could feature this sensor with one important condition, as explained by analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.

more…

The post Kuo: Apple Watch Series 8 could feature body temperature measurement, depends on algorithm quality appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: For the Apple Watch Series 8, it seems the wearable could feature body temperature measurement with one important condition, says Kuo.
